author: Special Correspondent
text: Five persons including a police head constable were arrested by police on charges of mining sands in an area which is under the control of Forest Department on Sunday. According to sources, V. Suresh (40), head constable attached to Special Police Pudupettai, Cuddalore District has been identified as one of the accused. The group was rounded up while mining sand from Malattaru Channel. An earthmover and a tipper lorry were seized.
title: Policeman held for mining sand
